summary: HARAMBE INU - HARAMBE INU is a decentralized platform completely focused on making donations towards highly endangered animals such as gorillas. A token completely focused on donations and giving back. Harambe's goal is to make the world a better place while having fun in the process! Aiming to honor and remember the legacy of the great gorilla by the name of Harambe and recognize the good in those beautiful creatures closest to the human race.
